Name: Authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in eleven BIDs.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in eleven business improvement districts
Summary: This bill would authorize eleven existing business improvement districts (“BIDs”) throughout the City to increase the amount they expend annually.
Text:
Int. No. 1698

By Councils Member Ferreras-Copeland and Palma (by request of the Mayor)

..Title
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in eleven business improvement districts
..Body

      a. The city council having determined, pursuant to subdivision b of section 25-410 of chapter four of this title, that it is in the public interest to authorize an increase in the amount to be expended annually in the SoHo business improvement district beginning on July 1, 2017, and the council having determined further that the tax and debt limits prescribed in section 25-412 of chapter four of this title will not be exceeded by such increased expenditure, there is hereby authorized in such district an annual expenditure of nine hundred thousand dollars ($900,000).
